project.description: An orchestration layer for AI coding assistants (currently Claude Code) that enforces consistency, reliability, and more predictable outputs through standards bundles and workflow automation.

default.responsibility: Root marketplace module that aggregates all bundles and provides project-wide Python test infrastructure via pyprojectx. Acts as the entry point for marketplace installation and bundle discovery.
default.responsibility_reasoning: From README.adoc structure showing marketplace installation and derived-data showing bundle aggregation
default.purpose_reasoning: Root module with marketplace.json descriptor aggregating 9 bundles

marketplace/bundles.description: Contains all marketplace bundles, each providing domain-specific skills, agents, and commands

test.description: Python pytest tests for marketplace scripts organized by bundle

default.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Root module uses plugin development domain for marketplace management

documentation.responsibility: Contains project-level AsciiDoc documentation including architecture diagrams, build structure reference, and roadmap planning documents.
documentation.purpose_reasoning: documentation module with no code, only documentation files

doc.description: Project-level AsciiDoc documentation including architecture diagrams and build reference

documentation.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Documentation module only needs documentation profile

plan-marshall.responsibility: Core infrastructure bundle providing environment setup, permission management, script execution, CI integration, project configuration, and cross-cutting utilities. Acts as the foundational layer that other bundles depend on.
plan-marshall.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill package analysis showing tools-*, manage-*, permission-* skills
plan-marshall.purpose_reasoning: Bundle providing reusable skills and tools consumed by other bundles

skill:extension-api.description: Extension API for domain bundle discovery, module detection, and canonical command generation

skill:manage-plan-marshall-config.description: Project-level marshal.json configuration management with skill domain setup

skill:tools-script-executor.description: Script executor generation with embedded script mappings for notation-based execution

skill:permission-fix.description: Permission fixes for Claude Code settings with ensure, add, remove, and consolidate operations

plan-marshall.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Core infrastructure bundle using plugin development domain

pm-dev-frontend.responsibility: Provides JavaScript, CSS, and web component development standards for CUI applications. Includes ESLint enforcement, Jest/Cypress testing patterns, JSDoc validation, and npm build integration.
pm-dev-frontend.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill packages showing cui-javascript, cui-css, js-* skills
pm-dev-frontend.purpose_reasoning: Bundle providing development standards and skills for JavaScript projects

skill:cui-javascript.description: Core JavaScript development standards covering ES modules, modern patterns, async programming

skill:js-implement-code.description: JavaScript code implementation with verification and iteration

skill:plan-marshall-plugin.description: Domain extension manifest providing npm build operations and workflow integration hooks

pm-dev-frontend.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Frontend standards bundle using plugin development domain

pm-dev-java.responsibility: Comprehensive Java development expertise bundle with agent-first architecture for autonomous code implementation, testing, refactoring, and standards compliance. Covers core patterns, null safety, Lombok, CDI, JUnit, Maven profiles, and quality verification.
pm-dev-java.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill/agent package analysis showing java-*, junit-*, agents for implementation/testing
pm-dev-java.purpose_reasoning: Bundle providing Java development standards, skills, and autonomous agents

skill:java-cdi.description: CDI patterns including constructor injection, scopes, producers, and container configuration

skill:junit-core.description: JUnit 5 core testing patterns with AAA structure, test organization, and coverage standards

agent:java-implement-agent.description: Autonomous Java implementation agent with standards compliance and build verification

skill:plan-marshall-plugin.description: Domain extension manifest providing Maven/Gradle build operations and workflow hooks

pm-dev-java.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Java standards bundle using plugin development domain

pm-dev-java-cui.responsibility: CUI-specific Java development standards extending the base Java domain. Covers CuiLogger patterns, test data generators, value object contracts, MockWebServer HTTP testing, and CUI library integration.
pm-dev-java-cui.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description showing CUI-specific patterns and skill packages cui-logging, cui-testing, cui-http
pm-dev-java-cui.purpose_reasoning: Extension bundle that adds CUI-specific skills to the base pm-dev-java domain

skill:cui-logging.description: CUI logging standards with CuiLogger, LogRecord patterns, and LogMessages classes

skill:cui-testing.description: CUI test library standards for test data generation and value object contracts

pm-dev-java-cui.skills_by_profile_reasoning: CUI Java extension bundle using plugin development domain

pm-dev-python.responsibility: Python domain extension providing pyprojectx build integration, Python best practices, and module discovery for Python-based projects within the marketplace.
pm-dev-python.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill packages plan-marshall-plugin, python-best-practices
pm-dev-python.purpose_reasoning: Domain extension providing Python-specific build and development support

skill:plan-marshall-plugin.description: Python domain extension manifest with pyprojectx build operations

skill:python-best-practices.description: Python development best practices for script implementation and testing

pm-dev-python.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Python domain bundle using plugin development domain

pm-documents.responsibility: AsciiDoc and documentation standards enforcement for CUI projects. Provides ADR management, interface specification templates, documentation validation, and workflow extensions for outline and triage phases.
pm-documents.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill packages manage-adr, manage-interface, ref-documentation, ext-outline-docs, ext-triage-docs
pm-documents.purpose_reasoning: Bundle providing documentation standards, templates, and validation skills

skill:manage-adr.description: Architectural Decision Records management with CRUD operations and AsciiDoc formatting

skill:ext-outline-docs.description: Outline extension implementing protocol for documentation domain discovery

pm-plugin-development.responsibility: Complete toolchain for creating, diagnosing, fixing, and maintaining Claude Code marketplace components. Provides plugin architecture guidance, component creation wizards, quality verification, and marketplace inventory management.
pm-plugin-development.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill packages plugin-*, tools-*, ext-outline-plugin, verification-mode
pm-plugin-development.purpose_reasoning: Bundle providing plugin development infrastructure, patterns, and tooling

skill:plugin-architecture.description: Architecture principles, skill patterns, and design guidance for marketplace components

skill:ext-outline-plugin.description: Outline extension for plugin development domain discovery and analysis

pm-requirements.responsibility: Requirements engineering and specification standards for CUI projects. Covers requirements authoring, planning documentation, traceability between specs and code, and requirement maintenance workflows.
pm-requirements.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill packages requirements-authoring, planning, traceability, setup
pm-requirements.purpose_reasoning: Bundle providing requirements engineering standards and management skills

skill:planning.description: Project planning documentation with task tracking and status indicators

pm-workflow.responsibility: Core workflow orchestration bundle implementing the 7-phase planning lifecycle: init, refine, outline, plan, execute, verify, and finalize. Provides task management, solution outlining, git integration, CI workflows, and PR/Sonar roundtrips.
pm-workflow.responsibility_reasoning: From plugin.json description and skill packages phase-1 through phase-7, manage-*, workflow-integration-*, task-*
pm-workflow.purpose_reasoning: Central orchestration bundle that drives the plan execution lifecycle

skill:phase-5-execute.description: Execute phase skill that runs tasks from TASK-*.toon files sequentially
